pageContext.claim: “Look at the statement he [Obama] made, when he thought the mics were turned off, OK? The stupid statement he made. Nobody does a big deal about that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump references Obama's open mike comment to departing Russian president  Dmitri A. Medvedev that “this is my last election. After my election I have more flexibility" to deal with Russia. Trump is wrong that the comment did not get much play; it was an issue in the 2012 election.
